descriptionHtml:
Are you a beginner and just want to kill those bandits easily with better protection?

Well this mod is for you as it gives you a variety of armour and a surprise weapon for you.

It is located in whiterun , bannered mare.

-------------------
INSTALLATION
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just copy it to your Skyrim / data folder.                                                                                -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------
CREDITS 
------------

Creation Kit
Skyrim Nexus
